datanetwork.javaosc
Class OSCMessage

java.lang.Object
  OSCPacket
      datanetwork.javaosc.OSCMessage

public class OSCMessage
extends OSCPacket

Defines OSCMessges and provides some methods to manipulate them.

Part of Sense/Stage

Based on Java OSC. Copyright (C) 2003-2006, C. Ramakrishnan / Illposed Software. All rights reserved.

address

Constructor Detail

OSCMessage

public OSCMessage()
Create an empty OSC Message. In order to send this osc message, you need to set the address and, perhaps, some arguments.

OSCMessage

public OSCMessage(java.lang.String address,
                  java.lang.Object[] arguments)
Creates an OSCMessage with a specific address and arguments. Ensures the server gets what it wants.

Parameters:
address - the OSC address the message will have.
arguments - the arguments that will follow the address in the OSCMessage.

Returns the OSCMessage address as a String.

the message's address.
